name: PortNum/Protocol of line in Etc\Services
description: Extracts the PortNum/Protocol portion of a line in Etc\Services file in Windows and possibly unix/linux, too.IOW:If a line in Services is:systat             11/udp    users                  #Active usersIt returns: 11/udpCAVEAT: returns extra spaces and may need to trim off. \s\s was needed in case PortNum/Protocol is referered-to in #comments
author: Denis St-Pierre
